channel.title: Home on I dream, therefore I am
channel.description: Recent content in Home on I dream, therefore I am

item.title: A few words on exponentiation
item.description: Although MathJax dominates today's html+latex landscape, I always feel reader-side rendering of latex leaves much to be desired. After getting my writer-side svg generation and embedding engine up and running, I thought, why not write something to test drive it? So here it goes. Mathematics First, note that a^b (a^b or a**b in most programming languages) is right associative. So, 2^{3^4} = 2^{81} , an enormous number of 25 digits, not (2^3)^4 , which is merely 4096.

item.title: About
item.description: About me (under construction) About this site What I use to put this site together: richly: my python script that renders latex as inline svg when converting markdown or org files into html latex: richly dependency pandoc: richly dependency dvisvgm: richly dependency hugo: static site generator xminxt: my hugo theme based on Yihui Xie’s XMin and enhanced with Alexander Sandberg’s CSS only (light/dark) theme switcher emacs: org-mode for editing posts xubuntu: richly (and almost everything else’s) dependency
